sentences: Ma arvasin, et see on hea m√µte.
Ta arvas, et me peaksime minema.
Meie arvasime, et see on vale.
context: The word 'arvasime' is the first person plural past tense form of the Estonian verb 'arvama', which means to think or suppose something. It is commonly used in sentences to express a thought or assumption that was made in the past.
